headline: AI trade is helping build out the 'next new economy': Strategist

headline: Micron Earnings ‘Best’ in Chip History After Nvidia. How Its Stock Became the New AI Darling.
summary: Micron  Technology earnings are out—and the AI trade may be back on track.  Micron Technology stock surged Thursday, the day after the memory chip maker reported better-than-expected earnings results and gave guidance that was significantly higher than expectations.  For the current quarter, Micron forecast a revenue range with a midpoint of $18.7 billion, above analysts’ expectations of $14.3 billion.

headline: U.S. Tech Stocks Rebound Premarket After Heavy Selloff
summary: Shares in U.S. tech stocks recovered slightly premarket after a heavy selloff in the prior session. Oracle climbed 1% premarket, having dropped 5.4% to a six-month low Wednesday. Broadcom stock is also on the rise after shedding roughly $422 billion of its market cap over the last five trading days.
